product_name: Sawyer Stay-Put System 1 Sunscreen SPF 30 - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 1 SPF 30 sunscreen offers sweat-resistant protection for your active adventures. Formula is designed to absorb well into skin to provide long-lasting protection. Sawyer Stay-Put System 1 SPF 30 sunscreen is enriched with aloe vera and vitamins.
short_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 1 SPF 30 sunscreen offers sweat-resistant protection for your active adventures.
